page.qtext: You wake up in the morning and see a robot in your kitchen. What do you do?
The robot says beep boop beep boop bop! Now what do you do?
Haha. That's hilarious. You and the robot sit down and have rice krispies for breakfast. The end!
Nice high five! You and the robot sit down and have cheerios for breakfast. The end!
You go back to bed and fall asleep. The end!
